overview: When he disappeared in the 1970s, Lula was a guerrilla of the Ação Libertadora Nacional. Rolindo was fighting for the retaking of his Terra Original Guarani in Mato Grosso do Sul the day he disappeared. Paulinho was on parole in May 2006, when he left home and did not return. Felipe went out at night to visit a friend, but he didn't come home.
title: Nós
